      • canDo

        public boolean canDo(SWActor a)
        Determine whether a particular SWActor a can attack the target.
        Specified by:
        canDo in interface SWActionInterface
        Parameters:
        a - the SWActor being queried
        Returns:
        true any SWActor can always try an attack, it just won't do much good unless this SWActor a has a suitable weapon.
